game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: Embark on a journey to recover the lost artifact that holds immense power, hidden deep within forgotten ruins.

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: Talk to the ancient hermit in the nearby forest who holds a map to the ruins.
A powerful beast guards the artifact. You must defeat it to proceed.
